MemberSignature.Value: member this.ItemTemplate : Xamarin.Forms.DataTemplate with get, set

Docs.summary: The to apply to each item in .

remarks.para: For example, to create the style shown here: , developers could use either the following XAML or C#:

example.code: <ContentPage ... xmlns:controls="clr-namespace:Xaminals.Controls"> <Shell.SearchHandler> <controls:MonkeySearchHandler Placeholder="Enter search term" ShowsResults="true"> <controls:MonkeySearchHandler.ItemTemplate> <DataTemplate> <Grid Padding="10"> <Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <ColumnDefinition Width="0.15*" /> <ColumnDefinition Width="0.85*" /> </Grid.ColumnDefinitions> <Image Source="{Binding ImageUrl}" Aspect="AspectFill" HeightRequest="40" WidthRequest="40" /> <Label Grid.Column="1" Text="{Binding Name}" FontAttributes="Bold" /> </Grid> </DataTemplate> </controls:MonkeySearchHandler.ItemTemplate> </controls:MonkeySearchHandler> </Shell.SearchHandler> ... </ContentPage>
